https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mOKoujs5F3CmWVIL9duyvJRxAm9.jpg Epitomising all the glamorous hedonism of the Roaring Twenties, Scott and Zelda Fitzgerald were a legendary couple, but their relationship was notoriously volatile and though both passionate and tender it was also mutually destructive in many respects. Beautiful and Damned
